answers.answer: Best approach to prevention is lifestyle.1. Normal body weight2. Exercise vigorously and regularly3. Low Carb Diet4. Be happy!
Despite what the media says there may be no way to prevent you from getting Diabetes.  You CAN delay it for decades by doing what Supper Sally says

question: My dad developed diabetes at a later age and I want to prevent it.
title: How can I prevent becoming diabetic?
